title: First win of the day mission dissapeared
body: It has been some days now since the first win of the day mission dissapeared.Is this supposed to happend or am i encoutering a bug?

replies.body:
Bladenite is correct on this one. It looks like you're at level 13, but in order to get the First Win of the Day mission you must be level 15.

It shouldn't be that much longer for you! Just a couple more levels. :)

Howdy Asundrix,

About a week ago, The **First Win of the Day**'s requirements have been changed... Now, The only requirement to unlock the **First Win of the Day** mission is to reach Level 15.

Sincerely
-Bladenite
